subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Victoria Azarenka beat Flavia Pennetta, 6-4, 6-2, on Friday at the United States Open, and will meet Serena Williams, who defeated Li Na, 6-0, 6-3.
snippet: Victoria Azarenka beat Flavia Pennetta, 6-4, 6-2, on Friday at the United States Open, and will meet Serena Williams, who defeated Li Na, 6-0, 6-3.
